migration-v15-router-link-with-href.description: Since Angular v15, the `RouterLink` contains the logic of the `RouterLinkWithHref` directive. This migration replaces all `RouterLinkWithHref` references with `RouterLink`.

migration-v15-relative-link-resolution.description: In Angular version 15, the deprecated `relativeLinkResolution` config parameter of the Router is removed. This migration removes all `relativeLinkResolution` fields from the Router config objects.
